original: snang ba'i phyir ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lhar chos thams cad mthong ba'i phyir dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar 'du byed thams cad mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i phyir ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lhar chos thams cad mthong ba'i phyir dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar 'du byed thams cad mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is apparent means that it is apparent as the sphere of the sky, and because it is apparent as all phenomena seen as deities, and as all formations seen as illusions and so forth.

original: phan yon rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: phan yon rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Realization of benefit is fourfold:

original: chos kyi sku rdzogs par rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / gong na med pa'i bde ba'i gnas pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / ston pa'i 'byor pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi sku rdzogs par rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / gong na med pa'i bde ba'i gnas pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / ston pa'i 'byor pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one attains the perfect Dharma body, because one attains the perfect abode of unsurpassed bliss, and because one attains the perfect endowment of teaching.

original: yongs su shes pa las rtogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: yongs su shes pa las rtogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Realization from thorough knowledge is fourfold:

original: gnyen po yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / khyad par yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / las yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyen po yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / khyad par yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / las yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of thorough knowledge of the antidote, because of thorough knowledge of the characteristics, because of thorough knowledge of the distinctions, and because of thorough knowledge of the functions.

original: de la gnyen po yongs su shes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de la gnyen po yongs su shes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Among these, thorough knowledge of the antidote is nonconceptual intuition.

original: chos dang / gang zag dang / gyur pa dang / tha dad pa dang / skur pa lnga mi bde ba'i ngo bo las zhen pa'i gnyen po'o //
analyzed: chos dang / gang zag dang / gyur pa dang / tha dad pa dang / skur pa lnga mi bde ba'i ngo bo las zhen pa'i gnyen po'o //
translated: It is the antidote to the five kinds of misapprehension of the nature of nonbliss, that is, misapprehension of the Dharma, of the person, of the process, of the distinctions, and of the deprecation.

original: mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ni /
translated: Thorough knowledge of the characteristics is the knowledge of the four noble truths.

original: yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par 'das pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / ngo bo'i don dang / bkra bar 'dzin pa lnga spangs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par 'das pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / ngo bo'i don dang / bkra bar 'dzin pa lnga spangs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The absence of attention, the transcendence of the latter, the pacification of the latter, the object of the essence, and the abandonment of the five: the apprehension of variety, are the intrinsic nature.

original: khyad par yongs su shes pa ni rtog pa med pa dang / phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa nyid dang / gnas pa med pa nyid dang / gtan du ba nyid dang gtan med pa rnam pa lnga'i khyad par gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par yongs su shes pa ni rtog pa med pa dang / phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa nyid dang / gnas pa med pa nyid dang / gtan du ba nyid dang gtan med pa rnam pa lnga'i khyad par gyi phyir ro //
translated: The knowledge of the distinctive attributes is due to five distinctive attributes: the absence of conceptualization, the absence of a one-sidedness, the absence of a basis, the permanence, and the total non-existence.

original: las yongs su shes pa ni /
analyzed: las yongs su shes pa ni /
translated: The knowledge of the action is due to five actions:

original: rnam par rtog pa ring du byed pa @48b dang ; bla na med pa'i bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bar sbyor ba dang / de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ring du byed pa @48b dang ; bla na med pa'i bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bar sbyor ba dang / de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa dang /
translated: the action of distancing conceptualization, the action of the gift of unsurpassed bliss, the action of the application to the separation from the obscurations of moral defilement and the knowable, the action of the penetration of all the aspects of the knowable by means of the subsequently-attained knowledge, and the action of the non-interruption of the two.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'i rnam pa lnga ni las kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'i rnam pa lnga ni las kyi khyad par ro //
translated: The five aspects of its activity are: it purifies the Buddha-field; it matures living beings; it bestows the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yid la byed pa rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: yid la byed pa rtogs pa ni /
translated: The realization of mental attention is as follows:

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de rtogs par 'dod pa de 'di ltar yid la byed pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de rtogs par 'dod pa de 'di ltar yid la byed pa /
translated: The bodhisattva who wishes to realize that non-conceptual intuition should pay attention to the following:

original: de bzhin nyid mi shes pa thog ma med pa'i dus can las te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid mi shes pa thog ma med pa'i dus can las te /
translated: It is due to the beginningless time of the ignorance of reality.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa sa bon thams cad pa ste /üîΩmi bden pa gnyis su snang ba'i rgyu dang / de la rten pa tha dad pa yang yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa sa bon thams cad pa ste / mi bden pa gnyis su snang ba'i rgyu dang / de la rten pa tha dad pa yang yin te /
translated: It is the universal seed of unreal imagination.üîΩIt is the cause of the appearance of the unreal duality, and it is the basis of the differentiation.

original: de la rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa snang du zin kyang mi bden pa yin no //
analyzed: de la rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa snang du zin kyang mi bden pa yin no //
translated: Although it appears as cause and effect, it is unreal.

original: de ltar snang bas kyang de'i chos nyid ni snang ba med la /
analyzed: de ltar snang bas kyang de'i chos nyid ni snang ba med la /
translated: Although it appears thus, its reality is non-appearance.

original: de snang ba med pa las kyang chos nyid snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de snang ba med pa las kyang chos nyid snang ba yin no //
translated: And from the absence of appearances, the appearance of reality.

original: zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na /
analyzed: zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na /
translated: When he properly attends to this,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no //
translated: the bodhisattva realizes nonconceptual wisdom.

original: de ltar nye bar dmigs pa las rnam par rig pa tsam la nye bar dmigs pa rtogs par byed do //üîΩrnam par rig pa tsam la nye bar dmigs pa las don thams cad dmigs pa med par rtogs par byed do //

translated: In this way, he realizes that the perception of objects is the perception of mere representations.üîΩFrom the perception of mere representations, he realizes that all objects are not perceived.

original: don thams cad dmigs pa med pa las rnam par rig pa tsam yang mi dmigs par rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: don thams cad dmigs pa med pa las rnam par rig pa tsam yang mi dmigs par rtogs par byed do //
translated: From the nonperception of all objects, he realizes that mere representations are also not perceived.

original: de mi dmigs pa las gnyi ga khyad par dmigs par rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa las gnyi ga khyad par dmigs par rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: From that nonperception, he realizes the perception of the difference between the two.

original: der gang yang gnyis dmigs pa med pa de ni /
analyzed: der gang yang gnyis dmigs pa med pa de ni /
translated: In that regard, the nonperception of the duality is

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /üîΩyul med cing /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te / yul med cing /
translated: nonconceptual wisdom.üîΩIt is objectless

original: dmigs pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa yin te /
translated: and without a point of reference.

original: mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: because all signs are not perceived, and because they are characterized by that nonperception.

original: / sbyor bas rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: / sbyor bas rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Realization through practice is fourfold:

original: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pas sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de nyid nges par 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pas sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de nyid nges par 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: because it is practiced through aspiration on the stage of action in faith, and because it is the stage of the penetrating insight of that stage.

analyzed: sa dang po la so sor rig par sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de nyid ni reg pa'i gnas skabs so // rnam par @49a * //
translated: Because it is practiced in the realization of the first stage, and because it is the stage of the contact with that stage.

original: ma dag pa'i sa drug la sgom pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir dang / yongs su dag pa gsum po la yang ngo //
analyzed: ma dag pa'i sa drug la sgom pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir dang / yongs su dag pa gsum po la yang ngo //
translated: Because it is practiced in the meditation of the six impure stages and the three pure stages,

original: de nyid ni rjes su dran pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nyid ni rjes su dran pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: and because it is the stage of the recollection of that stage.

original: sangs rgyas kyis la mthar phyin pa la sbyor ba'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis la mthar phyin pa la sbyor ba'i yang phyir te /
translated: Because it is practiced in the perfection of the Buddha stage,

translated: because the activity of the Buddha is uninterrupted through spontaneity.

original: de nyid ni de'i bdag nyid du nye bar 'gro ba'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nyid ni de'i bdag nyid du nye bar 'gro ba'i gnas skabs so //
translated: And because it is the stage of the approach to that identity.

original: nyes dmigs rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: nyes dmigs rtogs pa ni /
